name: Death Lightning
caption:
Incantation that channels the power of the ancient dragon Fortissax, now corrupted by Death.

It said that this golden lightning was wielded by Godwyn, who befriended Fortissax.
info:
Strike a small area around you with multiple lightning strikes which each leave behind a cloud of deadly mist for 3 seconds, causing <font color="#A17945">death blight accumulation</font> 5 times per second. Charging increases damage and number of lightning strikes.

<font color="#A17945">Death blight:</font> Instant death. Only effective against Tarnished.

<font color="#FFE033">Base lightning damage:</font> 513
<font color="#FFE033">Base lightning damage (charged):</font> 564
<font color="#A17945">Base death blight accumulation:</font> 30
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Dragon Cult

name: Catch Flame
caption:
Incantation originating from a sinister prophecy.

The flame of ruin is anathema to the Erdtree. But prophets sometimes glimpse it within the faith all the same. Sadly when this occurs their sole reward is banishment.
info:
Conjure a small burst of flame directly in front of you. Can be cast without delay after performing another action and on horseback.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage:</font> 225
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Fire Monk

name: O, Flame!
caption:
Incantation of the Fire Monks.

The Giants' Flame still smolders upon the distant northern mountaintop, and the Fire Monks are its guardians.
info:
Conjure a large burst of flame directly in front of you. Charging increases damage. Can be cast without delay after performing another action and on horseback.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage:</font> 257
<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (charged):</font> 301
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Fire Monk

name: Flame Sling
caption:
Incantation originating from a sinister prophecy.

The flame of ruin is anathema to the Erdtree. But prophets sometimes glimpse it within the faith all the same. Sadly when this occurs their sole reward is banishment.
info:
Lob a fireball. Charging increases damage and creates a small explosion on impact. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage:</font> 202
<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (charged):</font> 255
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Fire Monk

name: Flame, Fall Upon Them
caption:
One of the incantations that draws directly from the power of the Fire Giants.

There is no record of this incantation in common prayerbooks. Only a select few prelates know of its existence.
info:
Lob a barrage of fireballs over a wide area. Charging increases damage and creates small explosions on impact. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage:</font> 245
<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (charged):</font> 286
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Giants' Flame

name: Whirl, O Flame!
caption:
Superior incantation of the Fire Monks.

Fire beguiles those who gaze into it. And so the guardians of the Flame are also its worshippers.
info:
Shoot a stream of fire forward in a spiral pattern. Charging increases damage and distance. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage:</font> 91
<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (charged):</font> 106
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Fire Monk

name: Flame, Cleanse Me
caption:
One of the incantations of the Fire Monks.

This incantation leaves the caster with subtle burns—a reminder that they must fear the flame.
info:
Cure <font color="#40BF40">poison</font> and <font color="#EF7676">scarlet rot</font> and alleviate all <font color="#40BF40">poison accumulation</font> and <font color="#EF7676">scarlet rot accumulation</font>. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Fire Monk

name: Flame, Grant Me Strength
caption:
Superior incantation of the Fire Monks.

This incantation does not burn the caster, and so it is considered forbidden by the guardians of the Flame.
info:
Increase all <font color="#F395C4">physical damage</font> and <font color="#F48C25">fire damage inflicted</font> by 20% for 30 seconds. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Fire Monk

name: Flame, Protect Me
caption:
The most ancient of the Fire Monks' incantations.

It is said that this incantation was used during the War against the Giants long ago, during which it protected the champions of the Erdtree.
info:
Increase <font color="#F48C25">fire damage negation</font> by 60% for 70 seconds. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Fire Monk

name: Giantsflame Take Thee
caption:
One of the incantations that draws directly from the power of the Fire Giants.

Hurls a massive ball of raging fire.
Charging enhances potency and causes the ball of fire to explode.

There is no record of this incantation in common prayerbooks. Only a select few prelates know of its existence.
info:
Lob a large fireball which explodes on impact. Charging increases damage and creates a larger explosion on impact. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage:</font> 325
<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (charged):</font> 389
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Giants' Flame

name: Flame of the Fell God
caption:
This legendary incantation is one of several that draws directly from the power of the Fire Giants. Said to be inhabited by a fell god.

Arghanthy, the chief guardian of the Flame, had kept this incantation a well-kept secret until it was stolen by Adan. The fell god still lurks within the Fire Giants.
info:
Conjure a large, fiery orb which floats forward for a few seconds, or until impact, before exploding. The explosion leaves behind a fire which will burn on the ground for a few seconds. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (explosion):</font> 352
<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (fire):</font> 35
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Giants' Flame

name: Burn, O Flame!
caption:
One of the incantations that draws directly from the power of the Fire Giants.

The Fire Giants borrowed from the power of a fell god, and still they were defeated. Yet their failure released them from their solitary curse: to serve as keepers of the Flame for eternity.
info:
Conjure a large number of flame pillars around you. Charging increases the number of flame pillars.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage:</font> 288
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Giants' Flame

name: Black Flame
caption:
A black flame incantation of the Godskin Apostles.

Black flame is weighty. After dealing damage it continues to sap foes' HP for a very short time.
info:
Lob a fireball of black fire. In addition to the damage from the projectile, the enemy will also lose 1% of their <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> per second for 2 seconds. Charging increases the projectile's damage and creates a small explosion on impact. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage:</font> 214
<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (charged):</font> 248
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Godskin, Godslayer

name: Surge, O Flame!
caption:
Superior incantation of the Fire Monks.

The Giants' Flame is the flame of ruin, capable of burning the Erdtree. And so, following the War against the Giants, its ruinous blaze was sealed, and guardians were appointed to watch over it.
info:
Spew a stream of fire forward. Hold to continue casting. Can be cast while in motion and on horseback.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage:</font> 51
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Fire Monk

name: Scouring Black Flame
caption:
A black flame incantation of the Godskin Apostles.

The black flame could once slay gods. But when Maliketh sealed Destined Death, the true power of the black flame was lost.
info:
Sweep a wide area with black flame. In addition to the damage from the projectile, the enemy will also lose 1% of their <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> per second for 2 seconds. Charging increases projectile damage and distance. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage:</font> 255
<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (charged):</font> 299
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Godskin, Godslayer

name: Black Flame Ritual
caption:
Superior black flame incantation of the Godskin Apostles.

The Gloam-Eyed Queen led the apostles. It is said that she was an Empyrean chosen by the Fingers.
info:
Conjure a circle of black flame pillars around you, which will persist for 4 seconds. In addition to the damage from the projectile, the enemy will also lose 1% of their <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> per second for 2 seconds. Charging increases damage and size of the circle.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage:</font> 106
<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (charged):</font> 109
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Godskin, Godslayer

name: Black Flame Blade
caption:
A black flame incantation of the Godskin Apostles.

Black flame is weighty. After dealing damage it continues to sap foes' HP for a very short time.
info:
Enchant right-hand armament. Adds 65 <font color="#F48C25">fire damage</font> for 7 seconds. In addition to the damage from each attack, the enemy will also lose 1% of their <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> per second for 2 seconds. Can be cast without delay after performing another action.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Godskin, Godslayer

name: Black Flame's Protection
caption:
A black flame incantation of the Godskin Apostles.

The Apostles were all embraced by the Gloam-Eyed Queen, and the black flame was their armor within.
info:
Increase <font color="#F395C4">physical damage negation</font> by 35%, but reduce all healing by 20% for 70 seconds. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Godskin, Godslayer

name: Noble Presence
caption:
Ancient power of the Godskin Nobles.

Once a sign of the gods' wrath, this incantation became a trophy of the Nobles' god hunt.
info:
Produce a shockwave of black flame which may knock back nearby foes. In addition to the damage from the shockwave, the enemy will also lose 1% of their <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> per second for 2 seconds. Charging increases damage and size of the shockwave, and may toss smaller enemies into the air.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage:</font> 239
<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (charged):</font> 279
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Godskin

name: Bloodflame Talons
caption: A Blood Oath incantation, granted by the Lord of Blood.
info:
Conjure a set bloodflame lacerations in front of you, which then explodes. In addition to the damage from the attack it causes 50 <font color="#C84343">blood loss accumulation</font> per second for 2 seconds. Can be cast repeatedly.

<font color="#C84343">Blood loss:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 15% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 100.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (explosions):</font> 236
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Blood Oath

name: Bloodboon
caption:
Sacred incantation of Mohg, Lord of Blood.

The mother of truth craves wounds. When Mohg stood before her, deep underground, his accursed blood erupted with fire, and he was besotted with the defilement that he was born into.
info:
Scatter an arc of bloodflame which burns on the ground for 2.5 seconds. In addition to the damage from the attack it causes 30 <font color="#C84343">blood loss accumulation</font> per second for 2 seconds. Can be cast while in motion.

<font color="#C84343">Blood loss:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 15% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 100.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (projectile):</font> 159
<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (fire):</font> 44
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Blood Oath

name: Bloodflame Blade
caption: A Blood Oath incantation, granted by the Lord of Blood.
info:
Enchant right-hand armament. Adds 40 <font color="#F48C25">fire damage</font> for 60 seconds. In addition to the damage from each attack it causes 20 <font color="#C84343">blood loss accumulation</font> per second for 2 seconds. Can be cast while in motion.

<font color="#C84343">Blood loss:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 15% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 100.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Blood Oath

name: Barrier of Gold
caption:
One of the incantations of Erdtree Worship.

This incantation was used by the champions of the Erdtree in the First and Second Liurnian Wars, during which the red-haired Radagon joined the heroes' ranks.
info:
Increase <font color="#57DBCE">magic damage negation</font> by 60% for you and nearby allies for 70 seconds. Hold to delay activation. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Erdtree

name: Protection of the Erdtree
caption:
A superior incantation of Erdtree Worship.

Increase damage negation for all affinities except physical, for both the caster and nearby allies.

In the beginning, everything was in opposition to the Erdtree. But through countless victories in war, it became the embodiment of Order.
info:
Increase <font color="#57DBCE">magic damage negation</font>, <font color="#F48C25">fire damage negation</font>, <font color="#FFE033">lightning damage negation</font>, and <font color="#F5EB89">holy damage negation</font> for you and nearby allies by 30% for 70 seconds. Hold to delay activation. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Erdtree

name: Rejection
caption:
Incantation of the Two Fingers' faithful.

Hark, Tarnished! If you truly walk in faith, you must be prepared to reject all else.
info:
Produce a shockwave which may knock back nearby foes. Charging increases the size of the shockwave.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Two Fingers

name: Wrath of Gold
caption:
Superior Erdtree Worship incantation.

This incantation was discovered when the Elden Ring was shattered, and it was feared as a sign of the Erdtree's wrath.
info:
Produce a shockwave which may knock back nearby foes. Charging increases damage and the size of the shockwave.

<font color="#F5EB89">Base holy damage:</font> 350
<font color="#F5EB89">Base holy damage (Charged):</font> 420
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Erdtree

name: Urgent Heal
caption:
Incantation of the Two Fingers' faithful.

The Two Fingers has high hopes for the Tarnished; that even if they should be wounded, even should they fall, they will continue to fight for their duty.
info:
Restore 115% of armament's incant scaling value as HP for you and 57% for nearby allies. Can be cast while in motion and on horseback.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Two Fingers

name: Heal
caption:
Incantation of the Two Fingers' faithful.

The Two Fingers has high hopes for the Tarnished; that even if they should be wounded, even should they fall, they will continue to fight for their duty.
info:
Restore 230% of armament's incant scaling value as HP for you and 115% for nearby allies. Hold to delay activation. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Two Fingers

name: Great Heal
caption:
Superior incantation of the Two Fingers' faithful.

The Two Fingers has high hopes for the Tarnished; that even if they should be wounded, even should they fall, they will continue to fight for their duty.
info:
Restore 364% of armament's incant scaling value as HP for you and 207% for nearby allies. Hold to delay activation. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Two Fingers

name: Lord's Heal
caption:
Incantation bestowed by the Two Fingers upon the Tarnished deemed worthy of becoming a lord.

Tarnished—O, Tarnished! Seek the Erdtree and stand before Marika, its Queen. Become the Elden Lord!
info:
Restore 420% of armament's incant scaling value as HP for you and 210% for nearby allies. Hold to delay activation. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Two Fingers

name: Erdtree Heal
caption:
One of the ancient Erdtree incantations.

The Erdtree once flourished with abundance—yet it was only for a fleeting moment. Such is the course of all life.
info:
Restore 590% of armament's incant scaling value as HP for you and 398% for nearby allies. Hold to delay activation. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Erdtree

name: Blessing's Boon
caption:
One of the ancient Erdtree incantations.

Blessings once fell like tears from the Erdtree, and this incantation is but a lingering remnant of their power.
info:
Restore 8 HP per second for 90 seconds, and heals nearby allies by the same amount. Hold to delay activation. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Erdtree

name: Blessing of the Erdtree
caption:
One of the ancient Erdtree incantations.

The Erdtree once flourished with abundance—yet it was only for a fleeting moment. Such is the course of all life.
info:
Restore 12 HP per second for 90 seconds, and heals nearby allies by the same amount. Hold to delay activation. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Erdtree

name: Cure Poison
caption:
Incantation of the Two Fingers' faithful.

The Two Fingers has high hopes for the Tarnished; that even if they should be wounded, even should they fall, they will continue to fight for their duty.
info:
Cure <font color="#40BF40">poison</font> and alleviate all <font color="#40BF40">poison accumulation</font>. Can be cast while in motion and on horseback.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Two Fingers

name: Lord's Aid
caption:
Incantation bestowed by the Two Fingers upon the Tarnished deemed worthy of becoming a lord.

Hold to continue praying and delay activation.
info:
Cure <font color="#40BF40">poison</font> and alleviate all <font color="#40BF40">poison accumulation</font>, <font color="#C84343">blood loss accumulation</font>, and <font color="#A698F4">sleep accumulation</font> for you and nearby allies. Hold to delay activation. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Two Fingers

name: Flame Fortification
caption:
Incantation of the Two Fingers' faithful.

Follow the path that has been set for you, and you will make enemies of all others: the monks, the sorcerers, the ancient dragon knights, and the scions of gold. Heed me—the Lands Between offers no welcome to the Tarnished.
info:
Increase <font color="#F48C25">fire damage negation</font> by 35%. Can be cast while in motion and on horseback.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Two Fingers

name: Magic Fortification
caption:
Incantation of the Two Fingers' faithful.

Follow the path that has been set for you, and you will make enemies of all others: the monks, the sorcerers, the ancient dragon knights, and the scions of gold. Heed me—the Lands Between offers no welcome to the Tarnished.
info:
Increase <font color="#57DBCE">magic damage negation</font> by 35%. Can be cast while in motion and on horseback.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Two Fingers

name: Lightning Fortification
caption:
Incantation of the Two Fingers' faithful.

Follow the path that has been set for you, and you will make enemies of all others: the monks, the sorcerers, the ancient dragon knights, and the scions of gold. Heed me—the Lands Between offers no welcome to the Tarnished.
info:
Increase <font color="#FFE033">lightning damage negation</font> by 35%. Can be cast while in motion and on horseback.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Two Fingers

name: Divine Fortification
caption:
Incantation of the Two Fingers' faithful.

Follow the path that has been set for you, and you will make enemies of all others: the monks, the sorcerers, the ancient dragon knights, and the scions of gold. Heed me—the Lands Between offers no welcome to the Tarnished.
info:
Increase <font color="#F5EB89">holy damage negation</font> by 35%. Can be cast while in motion and on horseback.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Two Fingers

name: Lord's Divine Fortification
caption:
Incantation taught to Gideon the All-Knowing by the Two Fingers.

Gideon gained true knowledge after his long exchange with the Two Fingers—discovering all had been broken long ago; that the trembling fingers, bent with age, and the Erdtree itself, were no exception.
info:
Increase <font color="#F5EB89">holy damage negation</font> by 60% for you and nearby allies. Hold to delay activation. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Two Fingers

name: Assassin's Approach
caption:
Incantation of the Two Fingers' servants, who once served as the assassins of the Roundtable Hold.

The assassins were charged with eliminating Tarnished who had strayed from guidance.
info:
Completely negate fall damage and sound made by the during movement for 30 seconds. Can be cast while in motion, while crouching, and on horseback.

The height at which a fall is fatal remains the same even while under the effects of this incantation.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Two Fingers

name: Shadow Bait
caption:
Incantation of the Two Fingers' servants, who once served as the assassins of the Roundtable Hold.

It is said that those beguiled by the shadow see within it a hated foe.
info:
Lob a pale shadow which lures human enemies to attack it, even if they are already in combat. Can be cast while in motion, while crouching, and on horseback.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Two Fingers

name: Darkness
caption:
Incantation of the Two Fingers' servants, who once served as the assassins of the Roundtable Hold.

The assassins were themselves once Tarnished who had strayed from guidance, and they pursued their duty in the darkness that is without grace.
info:
Conjure a cloud of dark smoke for 3 seconds, which will cause any enemies hit by it to be unable to see you for 7 seconds. Can be cast while in motion, while crouching, and on horseback.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Two Fingers

name: Golden Vow
caption:
An incantation of Erdtree Worship.

This incantation has been taught to knights of the royal capital for generations, and knights sent on distant expeditions lean on it as a source of courage.
info:
Increase <font color="#E0B985">all damage inflicted</font> by 15% and <font color="#E0B985">all damage negation</font> by 10% for you and nearby allies for 80 seconds. Hold to delay activation. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Erdtree

name: Discus of Light
caption:
One of the incantations of the Golden Order fundamentalists.

A gift from the young Miquella to his father, Radagon.
info:
Shoot a small ring of light which goes forward then returns to you. Can be cast repeatedly and 2 rings can exist at a time. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#F5EB89">Base holy damage:</font> 114
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Golden Order

name: Triple Rings of Light
caption:
One of the incantations of the Golden Order fundamentalists.

A gift from the young Miquella to his father, Radagon.
info:
Shoot 3 large rings of light which goes forward at different angles then return to you. Can be cast repeatedly and 6 rings can exist at a time. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#F5EB89">Base holy damage:</font> 134
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Golden Order

name: Radagon's Rings of Light
caption:
One of the incantations of the Golden Order fundamentalists. A gift of gratitude to the young Miquella from his father, Radagon.

And yet, the young Miquella abandoned fundamentalism, for it could do nothing to treat Malenia's accursed rot. This was the beginning of unalloyed gold.
info:
Conjure a ring of light around you which expands outward in every direction. Charging increases damage and distance. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#F5EB89">Base holy damage:</font> 282
<font color="#F5EB89">Base holy damage (charged):</font> 333
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Golden Order

name: Elden Stars
caption:
This legendary incantation is the most ancient of those that derive from the Erdtree.

It is said that long ago, the Greater Will sent a golden star bearing a beast into the Lands Between, which would later become the Elden Ring.
info:
Conjure an orb of light which will float around while shooting a barrage of holy projectiles for up to 14 seconds, or until impact, and then explode. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#F5EB89">Base holy damage (orb):</font> 61
<font color="#F5EB89">Base holy damage (projectiles):</font> 20
<font color="#F5EB89">Base holy damage (explosion):</font> 199
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Erdtree

name: Law of Regression
caption:
Incantation of the Golden Order fundamentalists. One of the key fundamentals.

The fundamentalists describe the Golden Order through the powers of regression and causality. Regression is the pull of meaning; that all things yearn eternally to converge.
info:
Cure <font color="#40BF40">poison</font>, <font color="#EF7676">scarlet rot</font>, <font color="#9DD7FB">frostbite</font>, and <font color="#C18B8B">acid debuff</font>. Alleviate all <font color="#40BF40">poison accumulation</font>, <font color="#EF7676">scarlet rot accumulation</font>, <font color="#9DD7FB">frostbite accumulation</font>, <font color="#C84343">blood loss accumulation</font>, <font color="#A698F4">sleep accumulation</font>, <font color="#EEAA2B">madness accumulation</font>, and <font color="#A17945">death blight accumulation</font>. Remove all active special effects, such as buffs or debuffs from spells, from everyone nearby, including your own. Reveal mimicry of any form. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Golden Order

name: Immutable Shield
caption:
One of the incantations of the Golden Order fundamentalists.

Two concepts form the basis for Golden Order fundamentalism. One is the law of regression, to which this incantation relates.
info:
Enchant left-hand armament. Makes you completely immune to <font color="#57DBCE">magic damage</font>, <font color="#F48C25">fire damage</font>, <font color="#FFE033">lightning damage</font>, <font color="#F5EB89">holy damage</font>, <font color="#40BF40">poison accumulation</font>, <font color="#EF7676">scarlet rot accumulation</font>, <font color="#9DD7FB">frostbite accumulation</font>, <font color="#C84343">blood loss accumulation</font>, <font color="#A698F4">sleep accumulation</font>, <font color="#EEAA2B">madness accumulation</font>, and <font color="#A17945">death blight accumulation</font> from blocked attacks for 30 seconds.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Golden Order

name: Litany of Proper Death
caption:
One of the incantations of the Golden Order fundamentalists. Used by hunters of Those Who Live in Death.

The role of the hunters is to stamp out defiled reason—all for the perfection of the Golden Order.
info:
Shoot an arc of light along the ground in front of you. Inflicts 900% more damage to Those Who Live in Death.

<font color="#F5EB89">Base holy damage:</font> 56
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Golden Order

name: Law of Causality
caption:
One of the incantations of the Golden Order fundamentalists. One of the key fundamentals.

The fundamentalists describe the Golden Order through the powers of regression and causality. Causality is the pull between meanings; that which links all things in a chain of relation.
info:
Conjure a small ring of light on you which will explode after receiving 5 attacks. This does not include damage from status effects, damage over time effects, self-inflicted damage, or attacks where 100% of the damage was blocked using a shield. The resulting explosion doesn't harm yourself. The ring will disappear after 120 seconds if the explosion is not triggered. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#F5EB89">Base holy damage:</font> 487
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Golden Order

name: Order's Blade
caption:
One of the incantations of the Golden Order fundamentalists.
Used by hunters of Those Who Live in Death.

Enchants armament held in the right hand with holy-affinity attacks. This incantation is especially damaging to Those Who Live in Death. Any felled by this incantation cannot be revived.

The role of the hunters is to stamp out defiled reason—all for the perfection of the Golden Order.
info:
Enchant right-hand armament. Adds 75% of casting armament's incant scaling value as <font color="#F5EB89">holy damage</font> for 90 seconds. Inflicts 100% more damage to Those Who Live in Death.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Golden Order

name: Order Healing
caption:
One of the incantations of the Golden Order fundamentalists. Used by hunters of Those Who Live in Death.

The noble Goldmask lamented what had become of the hunters. How easy it is for learning and learnedness to be reduced to the ravings of fanatics; all the good and the great wanted, in their foolishness, was an absolute evil to contend with. Does such a notion exist in the fundamentals of Order?
info:
Alleviate all <font color="#A17945">death blight accumulation</font>. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Golden Order

name: Bestial Sling
caption:
Incantation taught by Gurranq, the Beast Clergyman.

It is said that in the time before the Erdtree, stones were the first weapons of the beasts who had gained intelligence.
info:
Quickly shoot a barrage of rocks in a cone-shaped pattern. Can be cast without delay after performing another action. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage:</font> 87
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Bestial

name: Stone of Gurranq
caption:
Superior incantation taught by Gurranq, the Beast Clergyman.

Long ago, Gurranq was a beast of such terrifying ferocity that his former name meant "Death of the Demigods."
info:
Shoot a boulder. Can be cast repeatedly and on horseback.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage:</font> 245
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Bestial

name: Beast Claw
caption:
Incantation taught by Gurranq, the Beast Clergyman.

This incantation represents the fury of Gurranq, his bestial nature returned, as much as it does his restless agitation.
info:
Shoot 5 claws along the ground in a cone-shaped pattern. Charging increases damage, size of claws, and spreads claws out more. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage:</font> 193
<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage (charged):</font> 222
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Bestial

name: Gurranq's Beast Claw
caption:
Superior incantation taught by Gurranq, the Beast Clergyman.

Long ago, Gurranq was a beast of such terrifying ferocity that his former name meant "Death of the Demigods."
info:
Shoot claws along the ground in every direction around you.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage:</font> 225
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Bestial

name: Bestial Vitality
caption:
Incantation taught by Gurranq, the Beast Clergyman.

Having gained intelligence, the beasts must have felt how their wildness slipped away as civilization took hold.
info:
Restore 5 HP per second for 120 seconds. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Bestial

name: Bestial Constitution
caption:
Incantation taught by Gurranq, the Beast Clergyman.

Having gained intelligence, the beasts must have felt how their wildness slipped away as civilization took hold.
info:
Alleviate all <font color="#C84343">blood loss accumulation</font> and <font color="#9DD7FB">frostbite accumulation</font>. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Bestial

name: Lightning Spear
caption:
One of the incantations of the capital's ancient dragon cult.

Long ago, Godwyn the Golden defeated the ancient dragon Fortissax, and befriended his fallen foe—an event that gave rise to the ancient dragon cult in the capital.
info:
Conjure a bolt of lightning and throws it. Charging causes lightning to strike from the sky at the point of impact which increases the damage inflicted. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#FFE033">Base lightning damage:</font> 234
<font color="#FFE033">Base lightning damage (charged):</font> 293
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Dragon Cult

name: Ancient Dragons' Lightning Strike
caption:
A secret incantation of the capital's ancient dragon cult.

Spoken of in legend, red lightning is the weapon wielded by the ancient dragons.
info:
Conjure red lightning strikes from the sky in every direction around you followed by 4 subsequent lightning strikes in every direcion that each expand outward. Charging increases damage, number of lightning strikes, and distance. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#FFE033">Base lightning damage:</font> 317
<font color="#FFE033">Base lightning damage (charged):</font> 379
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Dragon Cult

name: Lightning Strike
caption:
One of the incantations of the capital's ancient dragon cult.

Ancestors of the modern dragons, the ancient dragons had scales of Gravel Stone and wielded lightning as their weapon. It is said that once they attacked Leyndell, the Royal Capital.
info:
Conjure several lightning strikes from the sky in front of you. Can be cast repeatedly and on horseback.

<font color="#FFE033">Base lightning damage:</font> 246
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Dragon Cult

name: Frozen Lightning Spear
caption:
Incantation that channels the power of the Dragonkin Soldiers.

The Dragonkin were born in the Eternal City, where they knew no true sky, nor true lightning. Instead, ice lightning was their weapon.
info:
Conjure a bolt of icy lightning and throws it into the ground directly in front of you then conjures a barrage of icy lightning strikes from the sky in a cone-shaped pattern.

<font color="#9DD7FB">Frostbite:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 10% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 30, then increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage received</font> by 20% for 30 seconds.

<font color="#FFE033">Base lightning damage (bolt):</font> 240
<font color="#FFE033">Base lightning damage (strikes):</font> 307
<font color="#9DD7FB">Base frostbite accumulation:</font> 120
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Dragon Cult

name: Honed Bolt
caption:
One of the incantations of the capital's ancient dragon cult.

Long ago, Godwyn the Golden defeated the ancient dragon Fortissax, and befriended his fallen foe—an event that gave rise to the ancient dragon cult in the capital.
info:
Conjure a lightning strike from the sky. Can be cast repeatedly and on horseback.

<font color="#FFE033">Base lightning damage:</font> 205
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Dragon Cult

name: Ancient Dragons' Lightning Spear
caption:
A secret incantation of the capital's ancient dragon cult.

Spoken of in legend, red lightning is the weapon wielded by the ancient dragons.
info:
Conjure a bolt of red lightning and throws it into the ground directly in front of you which causes an explosion followed by lightning running along the ground in all 4 cardinal directions.

<font color="#FFE033">Base lightning damage (bolt):</font> 360
<font color="#FFE033">Base lightning damage (explosion):</font> 122
<font color="#FFE033">Base lightning damage (ground):</font> 285
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Dragon Cult

name: Fortissax's Lightning Spear
caption:
Incantation that channels the power of the ancient dragon Fortissax.

During the War of the Ancient Dragons, these twin red lightning stakes were the hallmark of one ancient dragon who was called the mightiest boulderstone.
info:
Conjure 2 bolts of red lightning and throws them into the ground directly in front of you, one after the other, which each cause an explosion followed by lighting running along the ground in all 4 cardinal directions. The second bolt is slightly stronger than the first.

<font color="#FFE033">Base lightning damage (bolt):</font> 367, 374
<font color="#FFE033">Base lightning damage (explosion):</font> 122, 123
<font color="#FFE033">Base lightning damage (ground):</font> 288, 292
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Dragon Cult

name: Lansseax's Glaive
caption:
Incantation that channels the power of the ancient dragon Lansseax.

Lansseax was the sister of Fortissax. It is said that she took the form of a human to commune with the knights as a priestess of the ancient dragon cult.
info:
Conjure a glaive of red lightning and swipe it horizontally, followed by a very wide arc of red lightning running along the ground.

<font color="#FFE033">Base lightning damage (glaive):</font> 325
<font color="#FFE033">Base lightning damage (ground):</font> 167
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Dragon Cult

name: Electrify Armament
caption:
One of the incantations of the capital's ancient dragon cult.

Long ago, Godwyn the Golden defeated the ancient dragon Fortissax, and befriended his fallen foe—an event that gave rise to the ancient dragon cult in the capital.
info:
Enchant right-hand armament. Adds 75% of casting armament's incant scaling value as <font color="#FFE033">lightning damage</font> for 90 seconds.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Dragon Cult

name: Vyke's Dragonbolt
caption:
Incantation of Vyke, knight of the Roundtable Hold.

Of all the knights, Vyke the Dragonspear was the one Lansseax loved the most.
info:
Enchant right-hand armament and your body. Adds 75% of casting armament's incant scaling value as <font color="#FFE033">lightning damage</font> and increases <font color="#E0B985">maximum equip load</font> by 15%, but reduces <font color="#FFE033">lightning damage negation</font> by 35% for 90 seconds.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Dragon Cult

name: Dragonbolt Blessing
caption:
Superior incantation of the capital's ancient dragon cult.

Summons lightning to bolster the caster's body. Attacks become easier to deflect and resistance to all ailments is increased. However, lightning damage negation will be reduced.

Only those loved by dragons can survive the ordeal of cladding their bodies in lightning.
info:
Enchant your body. Increases <font color="#E0B985">all resistances</font> by 30 and lighter <font color="#F395C4">physical attacks</font> from enemies will also cause the enemy to briefly stagger backwards after hitting you, but reduces <font color="#FFE033">lightning damage negation</font> by 35% for 70 seconds.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Dragon Cult

name: Dragonfire
caption:
One of the incantations of Dragon Communion.

Incantation of those who have hunted dragons and feasted upon their hearts. Theirs is a pure and overwhelming power.
info:
Conjure a dragon head that breathes fire, which inflicts <font color="#F48C25">fire damage</font> 2 times per second. Hold to extend duration. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage:</font> 144
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Dragon Communion

name: Agheel's Flame
caption:
Superior incantation of Dragon Communion. Channels the power of the flying dragon Agheel.

The dead gazed at the skies over the lakes of Limgrave, praying that the dragons' flames would burn them to ash.
info:
Jump up and conjure a dragon head that breathes fire, which inflicts <font color="#F48C25">fire damage</font> 2 times per second. Hold to extend duration. Can be cast while in the air.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage:</font> 169
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Dragon Communion

name: Magma Breath
caption:
One of the incantations of Dragon Communion.

Those who have performed the Dragon Communion will find their humanity slowly slipping away. Once they fully succumb to their fate, they are left no more than wyrms that crawl the earth.
info:
Conjure a wyrm head to lob a ball of magma which will remain on the ground where it lands for 6 seconds. Allows one follow-up cast, which will be the same as the first. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (projectile):</font> 223
<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (ground):</font> 34
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Dragon Communion

name: Theodorix's Magma
caption:
Superior incantation of Dragon Communion. Channels the power of the great wyrm Theodorix.

The name of the ancient troll warrior Theodorix lives on—as a hero of the War against the Giants.
info:
Conjure a great wyrm head to lob a lerge ball of magma which will spread on the ground where it lands and remain for for 6 seconds. Allows one follow-up cast, which will be the same as the first. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (projectile):</font> 315
<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (ground):</font> 40
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Dragon Communion

name: Dragonice
caption:
One of the incantations of Dragon Communion.

Those extraordinary individuals who perpetuate Dragon Communion are called the dragon-hearted.
info:
Conjure a dragon head that breathes an icy mist which inflicts <font color="#57DBCE">magic damage</font> and <font color="#9DD7FB">frostbite accumulation</font> 2 times per second. Hold to extend duration. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#9DD7FB">Frostbite:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 10% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 30, then increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage received</font> by 20% for 30 seconds.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 135
<font color="#9DD7FB">Base frostbite accumulation:</font> 110
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Dragon Communion

name: Borealis's Mist
caption:
Superior incantation of Dragon Communion. Channels the power of Borealis, the Freezing Fog.

The ice dragons were once lords of the mountaintops long ago, until they were defeated by the Fire Giants and chased from the peak.
info:
Jump up and conjure a dragon head that breathes an icy mist which inflicts <font color="#57DBCE">magic damage</font> and <font color="#9DD7FB">frostbite accumulation</font> 2 times per second. Hold to extend duration. Can be cast while in the air.

<font color="#9DD7FB">Frostbite:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 10% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 30, then increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage received</font> by 20% for 30 seconds.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 158
<font color="#9DD7FB">Base frostbite accumulation:</font> 110
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Dragon Communion

name: Rotten Breath
caption:
One of the incantations of Dragon Communion.

Those extraordinary individuals who perpetuate Dragon Communion are called the dragon-hearted.
info:
Conjure a dragon head that breathes a rotten mist which inflicts <font color="#F395C4">physical damage</font> and <font color="#EF7676">scarlet rot accumulation</font> 2 times per second. Hold to extend duration. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#EF7676">Scarlet rot:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 0.33% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 33, every second for 90 seconds.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage:</font> 131
<font color="#EF7676">Base scarlet rot accumulation:</font> 65
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Dragon Communion

name: Ekzykes's Decay
caption:
Superior incantation of Dragon Communion.
Channels the power of Ekzykes, the Decaying.

Ekzykes, Dragon Communion Revenger, did not forget his hatred even as he succumbed to the scarlet rot.
info:
Jump up and conjure a dragon head that breathes a rotten mist which inflicts <font color="#F395C4">physical damage</font> and <font color="#EF7676">scarlet rot accumulation</font> 2 times per second. Hold to extend duration. Can be cast while in the air.

<font color="#EF7676">Scarlet rot:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 0.33% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 33, every second for 90 seconds.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage:</font> 155
<font color="#EF7676">Base scarlet rot accumulation:</font> 65
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Dragon Communion

name: Glintstone Breath
caption:
One of the incantations of Dragon Communion.

Those extraordinary individuals who perpetuate Dragon Communion are called the dragon-hearted.
info:
Conjure a dragon head that breathes magical flames, which inflicts <font color="#57DBCE">magic damage</font> 2 times per second. Hold to extend duration. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 159
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Dragon Communion

name: Smarag's Glintstone Breath
caption:
Superior incantation of Dragon Communion.
Channels the power of Smarag, the Glintstone Dragon.

Smarag was a devourer of sorcerers, and over time, his body became corrupted by their glintstones.
info:
Jump up and conjure a dragon head that breathes magical flames, which inflicts <font color="#57DBCE">magic damage</font> 2 times per second. Hold to extend duration. Can be cast while in the air.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 188
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Dragon Communion

name: Placidusax's Ruin
caption:
Power gleaned from the remembrance of Dragonlord Placidusax.

These are the dying wails of the Dragonlord who once dwelled eternally beyond time.
info:
Cause an explosion of red lightning around you then jump up and conjure a dragon head which shoots a golden beam in a wide arc in front of you. Can be cast while in the air.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (beam):</font> 356
<font color="#FFE033">Base lightning damage (explosion):</font> 241
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> None

name: Dragonclaw
caption:
One of the incantations of Dragon Communion.

Incantation of those who have hunted dragons and feasted upon their hearts. Theirs is a pure and overwhelming power.
info:
Conjure a dragon claw and slam in to the ground to cause a shockwave. Allows one follow-up cast, which is slightly stronger.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage (claw):</font> 395, 410
<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage (shockwave):</font> 253, 263
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Dragon Communion

name: Dragonmaw
caption:
One of the incantations of Dragon Communion.

Incantation of those who have hunted dragons and feasted upon their hearts. Theirs is a pure and overwhelming power.
info:
Conjure a dragon head which will bite in front of you.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage:</font> 628
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Dragon Communion

name: Greyoll's Roar
caption:
Superior incantation of Dragon Communion. Channels the power of Greyoll, the Elder Dragon. An incantation of legendary status.

Greyoll was the mother of all dragons, dwarfing all who stood before her like a looming mountain.
info:
Conjure a dragon head which lets out a loud roar. Reduces <font color="#E0B985">all damage inflicted</font> by 15% and <font color="#E0B985">all damage negation</font> by 10% for all nearby enemies for 60 seconds.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Dragon Communion

name: Pest Threads
caption:
Incantation of the servants of rot.

A technique of the pale pests who crawl through the lands afflicted by scarlet rot; the abandoned children of the goddess.
"Do you have an interest in rot incantations?"
info:
Shoot a large number of projectiles in an arc above you, which then fly toward the target.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage:</font> 60
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Servants of Rot

name: Swarm of Flies
caption:
A Blood Oath incantation, shared from the Lord of Blood's power.

The new palace of the Lord of Blood lies in a swamp of festering blood, and these flies are said to spawn from excrement in that land.
info:
Conjure a swarm of bloodflies which attack the target 6 times with alternating damage. Can be cast while in motion and on horseback.

<font color="#C84343">Blood loss:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 15% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 100.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage:</font> 52, 15, 52, 15, 52, 15
<font color="#C84343">Base blood loss accumulation:</font> 0, 70, 0, 70, 0, 70
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Blood Oath

name: Poison Mist
caption:
Incantation of the servants of rot.

Those who dwell within poison know rot all too well. The death that begets life, that comes to all equally. That is to say: it is the cycle of rebirth put into practice.
info:
Conjure a cloud of poison mist which lasts for 15 seconds and causes <font color="#40BF40">poison accumulation</font> 5 times per second. Can be cast while in motion and on horseback.

<font color="#40BF40">Poison:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 0.07% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 7, every second for 90 seconds.

<font color="#40BF40">Base poison accumulation:</font> 20
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Servants of Rot

name: Poison Armament
caption:
Incantation of the servants of rot.

Those who dwell within poison know rot all too well. The death that begets life, that comes to all equally. That is to say: it is the cycle of rebirth put into practice.
info:
Enchant right-hand armament. Causes 70 <font color="#40BF40">poison accumulation</font> per attack for 60 seconds. Can be cast while in motion.

<font color="#40BF40">Poison:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 0.07% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 7, every second for 90 seconds.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Servants of Rot

name: Scarlet Aeonia
caption:
Technique of Malenia, the Goddess of Rot.

Each time the scarlet flower blooms, Malenia's rot advances. It has bloomed twice already. With the third bloom, she will become a true goddess.
info:
Incarnate a giant flower that blooms into an explosion of scarlet rot mist which lingers for 4 seconds.

<font color="#EF7676">Scarlet rot:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 0.33% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 13, every second for 90 seconds.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage (explosion):</font> 362
<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage (mist):</font> 60
<font color="#EF7676">Base scarlet rot accumulation (explosion):</font> 150
<font color="#EF7676">Base scarlet rot accumulation (mist):</font> 50
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Servants of Rot

name: Inescapable Frenzy
caption:
Incantation originating from the maddening Three Fingers.

To gaze into one another's eyes is truly the most intimate form of human contact.
info:
Grab a Tarnished and emit a yellow flame of frenzy directly into their eyes 6 times. Causes <font color="#EEAA2B">madness accumulation</font> on yourself for the initial cast and each of the 6 hits. This is only effective against Tarnished and cannot be used on any other enemies.

<font color="#EEAA2B">Madness:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 15% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 100 and reduces FP equal to 10% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum FP</font> plus 30. Only on Tarnished.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage:</font> 70
<font color="#EEAA2B">Base madness accumulation:</font> 50
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Frenzied Flame

name: The Flame of Frenzy
caption:
Incantation originating from the maddening Three Fingers.

The flame of frenzy deals damage and causes accumulation of madness. This incantation also causes accumulation of madness in the caster, and is only effective against Tarnished.
info:
Sporadically shoot several yellow flame of frenzy streams. Charging increases damage and distance. Causes <font color="#EEAA2B">madness accumulation</font> on yourself. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#EEAA2B">Madness:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 15% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 100 and reduces FP equal to 10% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum FP</font> plus 30. Only on Tarnished.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage:</font> 107
<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (charged):</font> 124
<font color="#EEAA2B">Base madness accumulation:</font> 25
<font color="#EEAA2B">Base madness accumulation (charged):</font> 35
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Frenzied Flame

name: Unendurable Frenzy
caption:
Incantation originating from the maddening Three Fingers.

It is the maddening pain and unstoppable tears of those afflicted with the flame of frenzy brought into being.
info:
Sporadically shoot several yellow flame of frenzy streams forward, then several more in every direction. Hold to continue casting. Causes <font color="#EEAA2B">madness accumulation</font> on yourself.

<font color="#EEAA2B">Madness:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 15% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 100 and reduces FP equal to 10% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum FP</font> plus 30. Only on Tarnished.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage:</font> 125
<font color="#EEAA2B">Base madness accumulation:</font> 25
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Frenzied Flame

name: Frenzied Burst
caption:
Incantation originating from the maddening Three Fingers.

In times past, every single person who attempted to control the flame of frenzy succumbed to madness after a desperate internal struggle. This incantation is testament to a meager victory.
info:
Shoot a blast of yellow flame of frenzy. Charging increases damage and allows projectile to penetrate enemy's guard. Causes 20 <font color="#EEAA2B">madness accumulation</font> on yourself, 30 if charged. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#EEAA2B">Madness:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 15% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 100 and reduces FP equal to 10% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum FP</font> plus 30. Only on Tarnished.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage:</font> 250
<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (charged):</font> 309
<font color="#EEAA2B">Base madness accumulation:</font> 90
<font color="#EEAA2B">Base madness accumulation (charged):</font> 105
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Frenzied Flame

name: Howl of Shabriri
caption:
Incantation originating from the maddening Three Fingers.

It is said that the sickness of the flame of frenzy began with Shabriri, the most reviled man in all history.
info:
Release a maddening shriek which produces a yellow flame of frenzy wave around you, hitting enemies several times. Increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage inflicted</font> by 25% but reduces <font color="#E0B985">all damage negation</font> by 30% for yourself for 40 seconds. Causes <font color="#EEAA2B">madness accumulation</font> on yourself.

<font color="#EEAA2B">Madness:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 15% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 100 and reduces FP equal to 10% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum FP</font> plus 30. Only on Tarnished.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage:</font> 22
<font color="#EEAA2B">Base madness accumulation:</font> 60
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Frenzied Flame

name: Aspects of the Crucible: Tail
caption:
One of the ancient Erdtree incantations.

This is a manifestation of the Erdtree's primal vital energies—an aspect of the primordial crucible, where all life was once blended together.
info:
Conjure a large tail a swing it in a horizontal arc in front of you. Hold to do a second, stronger swing.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage:</font> 202, 274
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Erdtree, Aspects of the Crucible

name: Aspects of the Crucible: Horns
caption:
One of the ancient Erdtree incantations.

This is a manifestation of the Erdtree's primal vital energies—an aspect of the primordial crucible, where all life was once blended together.
info:
Conjure a horn on your shoulder and ram it forward. Charging increases damage and cuases you to charge forward.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage:</font> 277
<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage (charged):</font> 327
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Erdtree, Aspects of the Crucible

name: Aspects of the Crucible: Breath
caption:
One of the ancient Erdtree incantations.

This is a manifestation of the Erdtree's primal vital energies—an aspect of the primordial crucible, where all life was once blended together.
info:
Walk forward while spewing a wide arc of flames. Hold to continue casting for a few more steps.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage:</font> 98
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Erdtree, Aspects of the Crucible

name: Black Blade
caption:
Power gleaned from the remembrance of Maliketh.

This blade was once imbued with Destined Death.
info:
Conjure an illusory greatsword and swing it vertically in front of you, which shoots out a projectile. Allows one follow-up cast, which is a slightly stronger horizontal swing. In addition to the damage from the attack, the enemy will also lose 1% of their <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> per second for 2 seconds and have their <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> reduced by 10% for 15 seconds.

<font color="#F5EB89">Base holy damage (greatsword):</font> 225, 232
<font color="#F5EB89">Base holy damage (projectile):</font> 162, 169
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Erdtree

name: Fire's Deadly Sin
caption:
Incantation originating from a deeply ominous prophecy.

The prophet despaired, looking up at the Erdtree, for soon the kindling would burst into flame, bringing ruin.

"The burning of the Erdtree is the first cardinal sin. That is not the domain of mere men."
info:
Create an explosion of flame around you, igniting yourself on fire for 40 seconds. You will take 3 damage per second during this time. Charging increases damage but also increase damage per second you take to 4.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (explosion):</font> 183
<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (fire):</font> 45
<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (charged, explosion):</font> 212
<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (charged, fire):</font> 59
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Fire Monk

name: Golden Lightning Fortification
caption:
An incantation of Erdtree Worship.

This incantation was used by the knights of the Erdtree during the assault by the great ancient dragon Gransax, and the bitter War of the Ancient Dragons that followed.
info:
Increase <font color="#FFE033">lightning damage negation</font> by 60% for yourself and nearby allies for 70 seconds. Hold to delay activation.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Erdtree
